make
```
g++ test.cpp -std=c++11 -o test
```


make run
```
./test

Identity matrix:

[[ 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 ]]

I * 4 =

[[ 4.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 4.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 4.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 4.000000 ]]

[[ 2.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 2.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 ]]

I - I =

[[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]]

[[ 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 ]]

[[ 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000 ]

[ 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 ]]

[[ 0.000000 -inf -inf -inf ]

[ -inf 0.000000 -inf -inf ]

[ -inf -inf 0.000000 -inf ]

[ -inf -inf -inf 0.000000 ]]
```


make clean
```
rm test
```
